page.title: 15MR. RACE - A LOCAL CRAFTSMAN
page.content: {When did you start carving from wood? In 1968{ {What do you carve? I carve pictures showing horses & other animals,also trinkets & jewellery {What do you do with your carvings? I sell them at shows & from my house {What tools do you use? Chisels and special knives {How many tools have you got? Approx. 60 chisels & many more knives {Where do you buy your tools? From special tool shops & I make some {What sort of wood do you use? Most varieties of hard & soft wood {Where does the wood come from?} England,but mostly foreign countries {Have you any other hobbies? I like model making & general construction projects.
